_header: I wot a bower so bright
_description: A fragment of a song, perhaps a religious love poem — one five line tail-rhyme stanza (aaaab)

CULAdd2585b.Transcription:
[I] wote a boure so bricht[ ]es kidde with kaiser and
                    knichtÞat time er leuedis lichtÞurgh mirþes of miche
                    michtals bende mun here
CULAdd2585b.Editions:
Heffernan,  Thomas J. 
             “Four Middle English Lyrics from the Thirteenth Century.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         43 (1981): 131-50: 146.
